author: chirino
msg: - precompile the bdb store's jade template so it has a nice html rendering.
- switch to the snapshot version of scalate.. website gen should once again work on it.

author: markt
msg: Duplicate attribute rules for the page directive are slightly different.
Based on a patch by genspring

author: tabish
msg: Remove most of the throws specifiers since they are depricated in the next C++ draft standard.

author: gtully
msg: remove priority flag from default jdbc impl as that is shared across dests, leads to conflict between priority and non priority dests, limit rowSize returned from durable fetch so we don't hog memory or return too few matches: https://issues.apache.org/activemq/browse/AMQ-2980
